name: procedurally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
according to a set of actions that is the official, legal, or accepted way of doing something, or relating to this set of actions: The plan must be administered in a procedurally fair way. Procedurally, responsibility is shared among several agencies.
More examplesFewer examplesHe admits that, procedurally, he may have made some mistakes.Some think that performance pay may be procedurally unjust.The stage was set procedurally for the Senate to take up the bill.
